parsed.title: O mito do menino mártir que virou brinquedo
parsed.summary: Um símbolo de injustiça medieval reaparece como objeto inocente nos dias de hoje, revelando como o poder e a propaganda transformam a tragédia em brinquedo. O vídeo expõe o ciclo de manipulação sem oferecer respostas, deixando a pergunta aberta para quem quiser aprofundar a história.

scenes.narration: Uma criança morta, acusada de ritual, virou símbolo silencioso nos corredores da história.
scenes.visualDescription: Dark cinematic digital painting, concept art style, heavy chiaroscuro lighting, painterly textures with cinematic composition, moody and atmospheric, dim stone corridor of a 15th‑century cathedral, a lone candle flickers, casting a thin silhouette of a small child on the cold stone floor, shadows stretching, no blood, oppressive silence.
scenes.motionDescription: Slow dolly forward toward the candle, flame flickering, dust particles drifting through the light beam
scenes.audioDescription: low echoing church organ drone, distant candle crackle, faint footsteps

scenes.narration: Hoje, o mesmo rosto aparece gravado em brinquedos que crianças abraçam sem saber.
scenes.visualDescription: Dark cinematic digital painting, concept art style, heavy chiaroscuro lighting, painterly textures with cinematic composition, moody and atmospheric, dimly lit toy aisle, a wooden figurine of a child stands among shelves, soft light from a single overhead bulb creates deep shadows, the figure's eyes glazed, atmosphere of quiet curiosity.
scenes.motionDescription: Gentle pan right across the aisle, dust motes floating in the weak light
scenes.audioDescription: soft ambient hum of fluorescent lights, faint rustle of packaging

scenes.narration: Mas quem financiou essa transformação? Um bispo, um tribunal e a imprensa recém‑nascida.
scenes.visualDescription: Dark cinematic digital painting, concept art style, heavy chiaroscuro lighting, painterly textures with cinematic composition, moody and atmospheric, cramped bishop's study, heavy wooden desk littered with parchment, a seal glints as a quill writes, a primitive printing press looms in the background, shadows dominate the room.
scenes.motionDescription: Slow push‑in on the parchment, quill tip moving, ink glistening
scenes.audioDescription: paper rustle, distant printing press clack, low murmurs

scenes.visualDescription: Dark cinematic digital painting, concept art style, heavy chiaroscuro lighting, painterly textures with cinematic composition, moody and atmospheric, black background with minimalist white typography reading 'The Gap Files.', subtle vignette edges, no additional elements.
scenes.motionDescription: Static frame, slight subtle fade in of the text

backgroundMusic.prompt: Dark Ambient, Low Drone Synths, Sparse Piano Notes, Tension Strings, Eerie Pads, Subtle Heartbeat Rhythm, Minor Key, well-arranged composition, 70 BPM
